import { useSelector } from 'react-redux'; export default function Movie() { const movies = useSelector(store => store.movies); const sira = useSelector(store => store.sira); const movie = movies[sira]; console.log(movie) return (

{movie.title}

{movie.genres.join(', ')}

{movie.plot}

YÃ¶netmen {movie.director}
Oyuncular {movie.actors}
{movie.year} {movie.runtime}dk
) };
